definitions.text: the (usually elliptical) path described by one celestial body in its revolution about another
examples: he plotted the orbit of the moon

definitions.text: a particular environment or walk of life
examples: it was a closed area of employment

definitions.text: an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control:
examples: the range of a supersonic jet
a piano has a greater range than the human voice
within the compass of this article
within the scope of an investigation
outside the reach of the law
in the political orbit of a world power

definitions.text: the path of an electron around the nucleus of an atom
the bony cavity in the skull containing the eyeball

examples: The moon orbits around the Earth
The planets are orbiting the sun
